name: Dancing Craze HD Lite
description:
Can you run a dance studio while teaching your clients a range of slick moves? That's the challenge in Dancing Craze, a thrilling new time management game in which you help a friend train performers for the biggest variety show Tinseltown has ever seen!

Open your own dance studio and train enough dancers for the big premiere! Each level is a celebration of good times as you beat mini-games, win trophies and use each client's unique traits to earn the money you need. Serve cool drinks and hot towels as your customers work up a sweat C-Walking; purchase a variety of upgrades to keep everyone happy as they wait their turn to Breakdance; and hire a fitness trainer and a masseur so you can focus on each client's Hip Hop moves. Hollywood is calling! Will you answer? Play Dancing Craze today!

LITE VERSION FEATURES:
◇ Ten levels (of 40 in the full version)
◇ Three awesome dances to teach (of nine)
◇ Nine upgrades (of 20)
◇ Chain and Color Matching bonuses
◇ Awesome decorations for your studio!
